question_id: Tampilkan film ber-rating 'R' yang dirilis pada 2006 dengan durasi di atas rata-rata durasi semua film 'R' tahun 2006; sertakan judul, tahun rilis, dan durasinya.
sql_query:
SELECT
    f.judul AS judul_film,
    f.release_year AS tahun_rilis,
    f.length / 60 AS durasi_film_menit
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE
    f.rating = 'R'
    AND f.release_year = 2006
    AND f.length / 60 > (SELECT AVG(length / 60) FROM film f2 WHERE f2.release_year = 2006)
ORDER BY
    f.release_year,
    f.judul
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    f.judul AS judul_film,
    f.release_year AS tahun_rilis,
    f.length / 60 AS durasi_film_menit
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
WHERE
    f.rating = 'R'
    AND f.release_year = 2006
    AND f.length / 60 > (SELECT AVG(length / 60) FROM film f2 WHERE f2.release_year = 2006)
ORDER BY
    f.release_year,
    f.judul;
```
